name: discord-on-call-announcer
description: Cloud Function to manage on-call rotations via VictorOps and Discord

scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:topic && npm run deploy:function && npm run deploy:scheduler
scripts.deploy:topic: gcloud pubsub topics describe oncall-rotation --project mento-prod || gcloud pubsub topics create oncall-rotation --project mento-prod
scripts.deploy:function: gcloud functions deploy handle-oncall-rotation --project mento-prod --runtime nodejs22 --entry-point handleOncallRotation --trigger-topic oncall-rotation --region europe-west1 --env-vars-file .env.yaml
scripts.deploy:scheduler: gcloud scheduler jobs create pubsub oncall-rotation-job --project mento-prod --schedule "0 11 * * 1" --topic oncall-rotation --message-body "Run weekly oncall rotation" --time-zone "Europe/Berlin" --location europe-west1
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --watch .env --watch tsconfig.json --watch pnpm-lock.yaml --ext ts,yaml,json --exec 'npm run start'
scripts.test:prod: gcloud pubsub topics publish oncall-rotation --message "Test" --project mento-prod
